entry.title: I always hated blogs
entry.content:
That’s true! I never knew why the hack someone would read and care pagewise stuff I write. But now, accidently it’s fun because now I got octothing that makes my life so easy and enjoyable, hurray!

The question now is: how long does it last and will there be one post to make it to production?

My gut feeling tells me “Maybe”! So let’s just see :)
